title: PACT Emissions GHG Breakdown Extension Schema
description: A Pathfinder Data Model Extension to provide detailed breakdown of greenhouse gas emissions by specific gas types.

CO2.description: Carbon dioxide emissions (CO2) as a positive or zero decimal value

CH4.description: Methane emissions (CH4) as a positive or zero decimal value

N2O.description: Nitrous oxide emissions (N2O) as a positive or zero decimal value

HFC.description: Hydrofluorocarbon emissions (HFC) as a positive or zero decimal value

PFC.description: Perfluorocarbon emissions (PFC) as a positive or zero decimal value

SF6.description: Sulfur hexafluoride emissions (SF6) as a positive or zero decimal value

NF3.description: Nitrogen trifluoride emissions (NF3) as a positive or zero decimal value
